LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRace.label: spider
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRace.description: This rabbit-sized genetically-engineered predator features eight legs, a hard shell, and a venomous bite.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRace.tools.0.label: fangs
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.label: giant spider
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.description: This monstrous muffalo-sized genetically-engineered predator features eight legs, a hard shell, and a venomous bite.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.0.label: fangs
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.1.label: front left leg
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.2.label: front right leg
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.label: giant spider queen
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.description: Half the size of a thrumbo, the giant spider queen is a prime example of genetic engineering gone horribly wrong. The queen varieties also have wings capable of flying short distances and stingers capable of delivering massive neurotoxin doses.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.tools.0.label: fangs
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.tools.1.label: stinger
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.tools.2.label: front left leg
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiantQueen.tools.3.label: front right leg
LanguageData.ROMA_Leather_SpiderGiant.label: giant spider chitin
LanguageData.ROMA_Leather_SpiderGiant.description: Thick carapace covered in lung-burning fuzz. Harvested from a giant spider. This thick skin insulates and protects very well.
LanguageData.ROMA_Cocoon.label: cocoon
LanguageData.ROMA_Cocoon.description: A silk spun cocoon for holding subdued prey both alive or dead.
LanguageData.ROMA_CocoonGiant.label: large cocoon
LanguageData.ROMA_CocoonGiant.description: A huge silk spun web for holding larger prey.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderEgg.label: spider egg sack
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderEgg.description: An egg sack filled with baby spiders.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderEggGiant.label: giant spider egg sack
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderEggGiant.description: An egg sack filled with baby giant spiders.
LanguageData.ROM_FilthCobwebs.label: cobwebs
LanguageData.ROM_SpiderSilk.label: spider silk
LanguageData.ROM_SpiderSilk.description: Fabric spun from fibers extracted from spiders. Similar to devilstrand, this is very tough, stronger than steel, but insulates no better than cloth.
LanguageData.ROMA_Web.label: web
LanguageData.ROMA_Web.description: A silk spun web for catching prey.
LanguageData.ROMA_WebGiant.label: giant web
LanguageData.ROMA_WebGiant.description: A huge silk spun web for catching larger prey.
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRace.tools.tools.0.label: fangs
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.tools.0.label: fangs
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.tools.1.label: front left leg
LanguageData.ROMA_SpiderRaceGiant.tools.tools.2.label: front right leg
